Text:
The album is an unplugged-classic. Bought it way back in the early 90s - "Signs" is probably the highlight although weÂ´ve prolly all got our favourites

Thx jerry

Video works, but is seperated into 5 20 min or so segments. the first of which glitches continuously through out when played in RealPlayer. I havent watched the last 4, but if theyre all like that, i dont want to. Like i said, good torrent, material is correct, and audio is a 10. but if the flashing black screen continues throughout, then im not satisfied. Ill try the other torrent, and comment on that as well. Its an ISO torrent. Hopefully its all 1 file.
